text: svargavakasikal narakavakasikaleat viliccuceadikkum: "nannalute nathan nannaleat ceyta vagdanannaleakkeyum satyamayippularnnat nannal kantarinnirikkunnu. ninnalute nathan ninnaleatu ceyta vagdanannal yatharthyamayi pularnnat ninnal neril kant manas'silakkiyea?” avar parayum: "ate.” appeal oru viliyalan avarkkitayil viliccariyikkum: "allahuvinre sapam akramikalkkan; sansayamilla.”
